comments.creator: yuanchong1986@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; SunOS i86pc; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110719005139

Steps to reproduce:

1. Invoke orca.
2. Invoke thunderbird 5.0.
3. Open thunderbird "Address Book" window.
4. Tools -> Import... to open Import window.
5. Select "Address Books" and click next button.
6. Select "Text file(LDIF, .tab, .txt)".


Actual results:

the items "Text file(LDIF, .tab, .txt)" and "vCard file (.vcf)" can't be read by orca


Expected results:

The text should be read by orca

comments.raw_text: Marco, can you confirm the bug please?
comments.text: Marco, can you confirm the bug please?
comments.author: surkov.alexander@gmail.com
comments.creator: surkov.alexander@gmail.com

comments.author: marco.zehe@gmail.com
comments.text: Oops, sent too early. This is confirmed. The list has no child list items. Only the MSAA focused item (NVDA-Key+Tab) reports the item, but it is not connected to the list.
comments.creator: marco.zehe@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Oops, sent too early. This is confirmed. The list has no child list items. Only the MSAA focused item (NVDA-Key+Tab) reports the item, but it is not connected to the list.
